question: 2022 NBA Finals: Who will win Celtics vs. Warriors Game 5?
description:
The 2022 NBA Finals is the championship series of the National Basketball Association (NBA)'s 2021–22 season and the conclusion of the season's playoffs. The finals follow a tournament format in a best-of-seven series. This season the finals are to be played between the Eastern Conference champions, the Boston Celtics, and the Western Conference champions, the Golden State Warriors.

This is a market on who will win Game 5 of the 2022 NBA Finals, a matchup scheduled for June 13, 2022 (9 PM ET).

This market will resolve to “Celtics” if the Boston Celtics win Game 5, and “Warriors” if the Golden State Warriors win. 

If for any reason the winner of this game is not decided by June 30, 2022 (ET), this market will resolve 50-50.

question: Will ‘Jurassic World Dominion’ gross more than $150 million domestically in its opening weekend?
description:
'Jurassic World Dominion' is a 2022 American science fiction adventure film directed by Colin Trevorrow. It is the sequel to 'Jurassic World: Fallen Kingdom' (2018), the sixth installment in the Jurassic Park franchise and the conclusion to the storyline started in the original Jurassic Park trilogy. Jurassic World Dominion premiered in Mexico City on May 23, 2022, and is scheduled to be theatrically released in the USA on June 10.

This is a market on how much ‘Jurassic World Dominion' will gross domestically on its opening weekend. The “Domestic Weekend” tab on https://www.boxofficemojo.com/release/rl4043671041/ will be used to resolve this market once the values for the opening weekend (June 10-12) are final (i.e. not studio estimates).

This market will resolve to "Yes" if ‘Jurassic World Dominion’ grosses more than $150,000,000 on the opening weekend. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

Opening weekend is defined as the first Friday, Saturday, and Sunday of the film's release. Please note, this market will resolve according to the Box Office Mojo number under Domestic Weekend for the 3-day weekend, regardless of whether domestic refers to only the USA or to the USA and Canada, etc.

If there is no final data available by June 19, 2022, 11:59:59 PM ET, another credible resolution source will be chosen.
groupItemTitle: More than $150 million gross on opening weekend?

question: Will Sergei Shoigu remain Minister of Defense of Russia through July 2022?
description:
This market will resolve to “Yes” if Sergei Shoigu remains the Minister of Defense of the Russian Federation without interruption from June 8, 2022, through July 31, 2022 (inclusive). Otherwise, this market will resolve to “No”.

If the Russian Federation is dissolved or otherwise ceases to exist before the resolution date of this market, or if the position of the Minister of Defense of the Russian Federation is otherwise eliminated, this market will resolve to “No”.

The primary resolution source for this market will be official information released by the government of the Russian Federation (e.g. http://government.ru/en/department/94/events/, etc.); however, a consensus of credible reporting may be used.

question: UFC 275: Who will win - Glover Teixeira or Jiri Prochazka?
description:
UFC 275 is an upcoming mixed martial arts event produced by the Ultimate Fighting Championship that is scheduled to take place on June 11, 2022, 10:00 PM EDT, at the Singapore Indoor Stadium in Singapore.

This is a market on whether Glover Teixeira or Jiri Prochazka will win their light heavyweight title bout.

If Glover Teixeira is declared the winner of this bout, this market will resolve to “Teixeira”. If Jiri Prochazka is declared the winner of this bout, this market will resolve to “Prochazka”.

If this fight is declared a draw, or if for any reason the match is not scored, postponed after June 18 or cancelled, this market will resolve 50-50.

question: UFC 275: Who will win - Valentina Shevchenko or Talia Santos?
description:

This is a market on whether Valentina Shevchenko or Talia Santos will win their women's flyweight title bout.

If this fight is declared a draw, or if for any reason the match is not scored, postponed after June 18 or cancelled, this market will resolve 50-50.

question: Will HOP token be above $0.25 on June 16, 2022?
description:
On June 9, 2022, Hop Protocol airdropped its token. You can view the airdrop announcement on their verified Twitter account here: https://twitter.com/HopProtocol/status/1534963591698427909

This is a market on if the price of $HOP (Hop Protocol) will be above $0.250000 in USD on June 16, 2022 (12 PM ET).   

This market will resolve to “Yes” if $HOP (Hop Protocol) has a candlestick closing price of $0.250001 or more, as per the resolution source, on June 16, 2022, 12 PM ET, and “No” otherwise.  

The resolution source for this market will be prices listed on CoinGecko (https://www.coingecko.com/en/coins/hop-protocol).  

This market will resolve according to the “C” (i.e. closing price) listed for the candle titled “Thu 16 June 2022, 12:00:00”, with the “Price” tab selected, in the Eastern Time Zone. Note, this 12:00:00 candle lists the opening price for 11:30:00 AM ET and the closing price for 12:00:00 PM ET.   

The check will be after the relevant candle closes. If CoinGecko is unavailable, another credible source will be chosen.

events.title: What will the price of Hop Protocol ($HOP) be on June 16, 2022?
events.description: This is a market on what the price of $HOP (Hop Protocol) will be in USD on June 16, 2022 (12 PM ET).
